## asyncScalar() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function asyncScalar<T, Temp>(
  initial: T,
  isTemporaryValue: (field: T | Temp) => boolean
): AsyncScalarStateType<T, Temp>
```

## Parameters

| Parameter        | Type                             | Description                                 |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| initial          | T                                | The initialValue                            |
| isTemporaryValue | (field: T \| Temp) =&gt; boolean | Checks whether the given value is temporary |
